snippet.title: Silence of the Sleep gameplay teaser
snippet.description:
Silence of the Sleep is upcoming psychological horror adventure indie game for PC.

NOTE: This is early footage, many things have changed since!
I have left shooting out of the game, it did not fit the atmosphere I was after! :)

You play as a man called Jacob Reeves. A man who has lost his reason to live.
He throws himself into a blackness, but instead of simply fading away he ends up in a nightmare.

You explore a dark, wicked world to find the very reason for your journey.

Silence of the Sleep will be released for PC in 2014.

http://www.silenceofthesleep.com
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Silence-of-The-Sleep/706974265996346
